DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Detection Other Assessment Method Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe another assessment method of how the disease or disorder was detected.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Detection Other Assessment Method
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The activity of perceiving, discerning, discovering or identifying._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.
